Description_lang: Your barriers absorb $s1% more damage and have an additional effect, but last $s3 sec.$?a431066[$@spellicon11426 $@spellname11426If the barrier is fully absorbed, enemies within $1220758A1 yds suffer $1220758s1 Frost damage and are slowed by $1220758s2% for $1220758d.$@spellicon235313 $@spellname235313Reflects $s5% of damage absorbed.]?a137020&!a431066[$@spellicon11426 $@spellname11426If the barrier is fully absorbed, enemies within $1220758A1 yds suffer $1220758s1 Frost damage and are slowed by $1220758s2% for $1220758d.]?a137019&!a431066[$@spellicon235313 $@spellname235313Reflects $s5% of damage absorbed.][$@spellicon235450 $@spellname235450If the barrier is fully absorbed, your next Blink or Shimmer within $1221106d grants Invisibility and immunity to damage for $1221107d.]
